member.name: NMUPDOWN
member.summary: Contains information specific to up-down control notification messages. It is identical to and replaces theNM_UPDOWN structure.

member.name: NMUPDOWN.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMUPDOWN.iPos
member.summary: Signed integer value that represents the up-down control's current position.

member.name: NMUPDOWN.iDelta
member.summary: Signed integer value that represents the proposed change in the up-down control's position.
